name: Algaevolution
description:
Welcome to Algaevolution

A lone algae stares into the sky... and wants to get some sun! Play as an algae trying to gain mass so they can achieve enough speed to F=MA their way straight into the sun! But watch out; Waterbears block your path, and the microscopic highways are unforgiving! With only 120 seconds on the clock, will our Algae friend make it to their goal? 

Controls

Controls: Arrow Keys / WASD to move. Spacebar to shoot. Press R on death/win to play again! 

The Cast

Algae - Our intrepid hero.
DNA - You must eat to grow your mass and speed!

 Tardigrade - Beware his fearsome charge.
Made by
  • polyrain: Programming
  • Scoville: Art
